channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Learning moment: Don’t intentionally hoard your points and miles

item.title: Credit card transfer partners: Guide to transferring points and miles to airlines and hotels
item.description: Here's a look at the airline and hotel loyalty programs that partner with major credit card issuers like American Express, Chase, Bilt, Citi, Capital ...

item.title: 5 things to do once you get your Chase Sapphire Reserve
item.description: Are you a newly minted Chase Sapphire Reserve owner? Here's how to maximize the benefits and perks you get with the card while working toward earning ...

item.title: Alaska Airlines' valuable points — and award chart — survive Atmos Rewards: 'Not trying to hoodwink anybody'
item.description: Alaska Airlines left its popular award chart in place as it unveiled its new loyalty program, Atmos Rewards, with Hawaiian Airlines.

item.title: Credit card transfer bonuses (September): 30% bonus to Virgin Red and more
item.description: Here's a look at all the current transfer bonuses involving major credit cards and airline and hotel loyalty programs.
